audio_emitter_create.htm+html.head.title: audio_emitter_create.htm+html.body.p:87-3
audio_emitter_create: This function creates a new audio emitter and returns the index for it. This index should be stored in a variable for all further functions that relate to this emitter, and then when it is no longer needed it should be removed from memory using the function audio_emitter_free() to prevent memory leaks which may eventually crash your game.

audio_emitter_create.htm+html.head.title: audio_emitter_create.htm+html.body.p:98-3
audio_emitter_create: The above code creates a new audio emitter and assigns its index to the variable "s_emit".
